pkgmetadata.longdescription: ================================================================Framework for extract data from vk.com (russian social network).================================================================This is a Python wrapper for Telegram Bot API.Quickstart==========Install-------.. code:: bash pip install telebot7Usage-----.. code:: python >>> from telebot7 import TeleBot >>> from telebot7.long_polling import get_updates >>> >>> token = '123456:ABC-DEF1234ghIkl-zyx57W2v1u123ew11' >>> tele_bot = TeleBot(token) >>> >>> print(tele_bot.getMe()) >>> >>> def on_updates(updates): ... print(updates) ... >>> get_updates(tele_bot, on_updates, timeout=10)See https://core.telegram.org/bots/api for detailed API guide.
